sentences.en: A lubricant formulation to reduce wear and prolong die life is developed.
sentences.cn: 研制出了降低磨损,提高模具寿命的润滑剂配方.

sentences.en: Chronic pain can exacerbate or prolong the function disability of the patients.
sentences.cn: 慢性疼痛可加重或延长脑外伤病人的功能残疾.

sentences.en: Danish entrepreneurs are working ontechnology that will prolong the life of batteries.
sentences.cn: 丹麦企业家正在致力于提高电池寿命的研发.

sentences.en: Have you heard that smiles can prolong people's lives?
sentences.cn: 你听说过微笑可以延长人类寿命 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has decided to prolong his visit through the weekend.
sentences.cn: 他已决定把他的访问延长到过完周末.

sentences.en: How can a joint venture prolong its term after it expires?
sentences.cn: 合资期满后,如何申请延长合资期限?

sentences.en: How can we endeavor to prolong the brevity of human life?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能延长短促的人生?

sentences.en: I was trying to think of some way to prolong the conversation.
sentences.cn: 我在想方设法拖长这次谈话。

sentences.en: It is a lovely night, and why should we not prolong our ride a little?
sentences.cn: 今天晚上的夜很可爱, 咱们为什么不骑马在外面多留连一会儿 呢 ?

sentences.en: It is said that eating little but often can prolong your life.
sentences.cn: 据说少食多餐能够延年益寿.

sentences.en: Lubrication and good abrasion resistance strong, and prolong engine life.
sentences.cn: 润滑性好,抗磨性强, 延长发动机使用寿命.

sentences.en: Paperback editions prolong its life and increase his income.
sentences.cn: 平装本延长了著作的寿命,使著作的收入有了增加.

sentences.en: People have all along been seeking to prolong life.
sentences.cn: 人们一直在寻求长寿之道.

sentences.en: Q: I've heard that cardiovascular exercise can prolong life; is this true?
sentences.cn: 问: 我听说让人加速血液循环的运动可以让人更长寿, 是真的 吗 ?

sentences.en: The defendant feigns illness to prolong the trial.
sentences.cn: 为了拖延审判，被告装病。

sentences.en: The operation could prolong his life by two or three years.
sentences.cn: 这次手术可使他多活两三年。

words.tran_cn: 延长的；拖延的；持续很久的
延伸；延长部分；[经] 延期

trans.tran_en: to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer
to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer
